General.Name: Intrasoft Technologies Limited
General.Description: IntraSoft Technologies Limited, through its subsidiaries, develops and delivers e-commerce and e-cards through Internet platform in India and internationally. It owns and operates 123stores.com, an e-commerce retail portal that provides sports and outdoor products, home and kitchen products, garden and outdoor products, tool and home products, and others; 123Greetings.com, which offers approximately 42,000 e-cards across various languages covering 3,000 seasonal and everyday categories; and 123Greetings Studio, a platform for artists to upload and monetize on their own e-cards. The company also sells its products through online marketplaces, such as Amazon.com, and eBay.com. IntraSoft Technologies Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Kolkata, India.
